title: Bandthwith usage
body:
Hey guys i would like to know how much data a game of league of legends uses, because an 45min game of league i use about 40 - 60 mb's.
Is this usual amount per game or is mine taking too much?
just asking because im playing on mobile data and getting 500 Mb's per day, playing with 125 - 150 ping

replies.body:
Heyo,

40-60 megs per game is about standard, it changes dependent on time spent in the game! Shorter ones should be on the low end of the 40s.
